item.title: Premiers pas avec jhipster
item.description: Installation de JHipster sur Windows # Installez Java 8 à partir du site Web d’Oracle. (Facultatif) Installez un outil de génération Java. Whether you choose to use Maven or Gradle, you normally don’t have to install anything, as JHipster will automatically install the Maven Wrapper or the Gradle Wrapper for you. If you don’t want to use those wrappers, go to the official Maven website or Gradle website to do your own installation.
